page.name: MMS Giving Crew
page.description: Would you like to help puppies in puppy mills? Would you like to advocate for kids suffering from terminal diseases? Would you like to get involved in your community? If you answered yes to this question, the MMS Giving Crew wants you!!! Through this club, you will find a cause close to your heart, experience it by volunteering on-site, and possibly even win a cash prize of $1000 dollars for your cause !!! So make a difference in your community and join us!
